title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: I play my first slot game ever that is not from free spin on Play’n Go slot provider specifically Golden ticket during 2017 but I didn’t manage to win big that time but rather experienced loss which makes me turn off on slot games ever. But last year I try to play again on Livecasino.io Rise of Olympus and manage to win x500 multiplier multiple times on this game. This experience makes me interested more on playing slots and I become addicted on on playing more on different slot games with same provider.I visit Play’n Go website and I’m surprised that they are releasing multiple new slots per month and the thing that amazed me was the time I discover Rise of Olympus was it’s just new release(which I’m not aware that time). After that I keep playing new release slot game with this same provider hoping to experience again the luck I made before. So far I have a good result on doing this instead of sticking on same slot games especially the old one.What’s your favorite Play’n Go games and what’s the highest multiplier you get on playing their slot games? Share your experience.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: I can tell you that Play'n Go is a well-known provider of online casino games, including slot machines, with a reputation for creating high-quality and engaging games. The high multiplier you achieved on Rise of Olympus is not uncommon for slot games, which frequently offer the possibility of large payouts and exciting gameplay experiences.However, it should be noted that the outcome of slot games is determined by random chance and cannot be predicted. While you may have had a good time playing new Play'n Go slot games, it's important to remember to gamble responsibly and set limits for yourself.I played these games numerous times, but I never received a large multiplier.

comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on February 05, 2023, 05:30:43 PMI play my first slot game ever that is not from free spin on Play’n Go slot provider specifically Golden ticket during 2017 but I didn’t manage to win big that time but rather experienced loss which makes me turn off on slot games ever. But last year I try to play again on Livecasino.io Rise of Olympus and manage to win x500 multiplier multiple times on this game. This experience makes me interested more on playing slots and I become addicted on on playing more on different slot games with same provider.I visit Play’n Go website and I’m surprised that they are releasing multiple new slots per month and the thing that amazed me was the time I discover Rise of Olympus was it’s just new release(which I’m not aware that time). After that I keep playing new release slot game with this same provider hoping to experience again the luck I made before. So far I have a good result on doing this instead of sticking on same slot games especially the old one.I am happy if you manage to get a win and profit in slot games, especially if you get it when you are playing it for the first time or trying it.It is true that there are many types of slot games that we can choose and play in order to get profits or jackpots that we never expected.If we pay attention and we really observe that there are lots of gamblers who like slot games, this game has even dominated every gambler's circle, so it's no wonder that Play,n Go always releases new slot games because there are really more and more slot enthusiasts. fond of even loyal to slot games.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: My favorite Play'n Go slot game is Reactoonz 2:I haven't won big on that one, but I have seen a lot of streamers hitting the moon in that game, and the animations are really nice, I highly recommend it to anyone to try it, it is worth a shot and with the right luck, it's a moon for sure.Getting the bonus isn't easy at all, so far I have more than 200 spins without the bonus, but some day should hit.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I have fun playing a few play n go games but play n go rarely hits huge wins for me. Banana rock, Tome of madness(maybe sadness), Green knight, reactions 1 and 2, and many more. You can play all day and barely hit a 100x on the bonuses.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: I like Play'n Go games specially Moon Princess Series, Rise of Olympus Series, Troll Hunter Series, Golden Ticket series and Tome of Madness.  I experience clearing the grid on Moon Princess, Rise of Olympus, Golden ticket 2, Troll hunter 2.  Clearing the grid on Golden ticket 2 and Troll hunter 2 gives 500x.  While clearing on Moon Princess and Rise of Olympus is dependent on your bet and the multiplier.  I almost got a max win on Rocco Gallo since I got the max amount on the pot money but Rocco does not land.Once in a while, I play Reactoonz series, Gigantoonz and Wild Frames.It is really fun to play slots of Play'n Go providers, the biggest multiplier I won on Playn' Go is 1200x+

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Looking at their games, Rise of Olympus is one of my favorite slot game and I was able to win some good money as well with this game as far as I remember. Though I’m not that particular to a game provider since I know most of the site almost have the same provider, planning to try their other games as suggested here in this thread, probably will try the reactoonz as well.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: I still can't forget my best free spin win on Sportsbet and somehow got at least x1000 on Rise of Merlin. I haven't been playing slots recently but I'll give it a go once I become active in the future and earn a bunch of rewards from their clubhouse since they improved it recently. I also remember sticking to Play n Go slots when receiving my rewards because i'm having a hard time winning with other providers as I usually get low multipliers.Quote from: ralle14 on November 23, 2020, 04:24:07 AMInsane how much you could possibly win from the clubhouse rewards. I've tried so many times before and wasn't expecting this big of a win from a $5 free spin. Manage to trigger the bonus rounds 6 times in a row and nearly got all the symbols.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: One of the reasons I like this provider is that it offers a penny bets.  In the case of the favourite, well, I really like Book of Dead, Legacy of Dead, (yes! nothing exciting) although one of the first slots I played in my early days, when I was simply looking for a slot to spin and I didn't notice what kind of provider or RNG, it was Reactoonz.Experience +/- -I don't like that autoplay only allows a maximum of 100 spins.+I like the Game History and the detail that each bet offers to explain how you won and to review when necessary to review for whatever reason.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on February 05, 2023, 05:30:43 PMWhat’s your favorite Play’n Go games and what’s the highest multiplier you get on playing their slot games? Share your experience.to be honest, I haven't had a good experience getting high multipliers at Play N Go providers. but from a few weeks ago I frequented the Livecasino thread and saw some other members sharing about a good experience on Play N Go with high multipliers, after that I decided to give Rise Of Olympus 100 a try.several times I always try to play there but maybe I'm not lucky and have never gotten an interesting multiplier, only 100x and I rarely get it.the reason I rarely play Play N Go is because to be honest I prefer to bet on slots that have a bonus spin purchase feature, such as Pragmatic.so I rely more on my luck on buying bonus spins.Quote from: Coin_trader on February 05, 2023, 05:30:43 PMThis experience makes me interested more on playing slots and I become addicted on on playing more on different slot games with same provider.a little advice from me, isn't it better for you to be careful in controlling yourself so you don't get addicted to slot gambling. it is very tempting to get a high multiplier. but if you can't control your budget, it's slightly worse to become even more addicted and eat up all your savings.

But I think it is waste of time and money.I am not playing anymore but I did read comments on the forum to increase my knowledge on the game.

comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on February 06, 2023, 12:01:06 AMI still can't forget my best free spin win on Sportsbet and somehow got at least x1000 on Rise of Merlin. I haven't been playing slots recently but I'll give it a go once I become active in the future and earn a bunch of rewards from their clubhouse since they improved it recently. I also remember sticking to Play n Go slots when receiving my rewards because i'm having a hard time winning with other providers as I usually get low multipliers.Quote from: ralle14 on November 23, 2020, 04:24:07 AMInsane how much you could possibly win from the clubhouse rewards. I've tried so many times before and wasn't expecting this big of a win from a $5 free spin. Manage to trigger the bonus rounds 6 times in a row and nearly got all the symbols.  Yes, of course, the Rise of Merlin slot tightens its game by running in demo mode, I hardly forced myself to quit the game, but after reading the reviews about the playngo casino itself on trustpilot, I lost the desire to register.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.created_time: February 06, 2023, 01:39:48 PMLast edit: February 06, 2023, 07:49:26 PM by swogerino
comments.body: I have quite some pictures of different multipliers and you beat me to this thread,I had the intention of posting an Arthurian legends thread from them as I only play such games as Swords and Holy Grail,The Green Knight,Diamonds of the Realm,15 Crystal Roses and Clash of Camelot,I wanted to ask people about their max multiplier in my thread but I think yours is even better and even more inclusive,will update this post with pictures once I go home.As I promised my wins here.Green KnightSwords and Holy Grail

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: My favorite play n Go games is all the "BOOK" themed ones such as Rise of Merlin, Legacy of Dead, Book of Dead and some others. What I like from these games are because I feel that the chance of hitting free spins is more than other games even more than other providers. What I dont like is that it is quite hard to win huge multiplier in Play n Go games, mostly just around few hundreds multiplier. Having more than 1,000x in Play n Go games can be considered as super luck moment.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on February 05, 2023, 05:30:43 PMWhat’s your favorite Play’n Go games and what’s the highest multiplier you get on playing their slot games? Share your experience.My experience is in Play'n Go slot games, some of the games you mentioned are good, it all depends on how you bet and enjoy all types of slots.My favorite slots:1. Wild Falls2: Wild Falls2 slot type is also a good type of game, if you are lucky, you can drop the treasure box into the waterfall and make a big win.2. Canine Carnage: also a challenging slot where you can generate wild skull and number 10 with good results.But among all the slots you mentioned, the ones I like and enjoy betting the most are:3. Clash of Camelot.You can get your victory x5 to x100, dangerous electric shocks can bring you a lot of money, besides that the most extraordinary thing in Clash of Camelot slots, namely FREE SPINS, as I showed above, from my winning experience some time ago, you can choose the flag you want, to determine a big win for you.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I'm not a fan of Play'n Go, but I've played a few games from that provider. But to be honest, I haven't found a game from the Play'n Go provider, which is my favorite because I prefer games from the Pragmatic Play provider as my favorite.Perhaps later, I will try to see the games from this Play'n Go provider, and it seems that I have a good feeling about playing Rise of Merlin, but I don't know. We'll see how lucky I will be later.

comments.author: chaser15
comments.body: Sad to say that I don't have experience winning a decent amount in Play'n Go Games.Don't want to ruin the thread but just sharing that my favorite game provider, for now, is THUNDERKICK and Rex Hunt is the luckiest game I played there so far. I almost try all their games and able to give me good wins but Rex Hunt is the most awesome game for me. I might be biased because I won there. Played that game first time in the Stake platform, and my username (chaser15) is just there on the Lucky Wins list.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: maydna on February 06, 2023, 02:51:20 PMI'm not a fan of Play'n Go, but I've played a few games from that provider. But to be honest, I haven't found a game from the Play'n Go provider, which is my favorite because I prefer games from the Pragmatic Play provider as my favorite.Perhaps later, I will try to see the games from this Play'n Go provider, and it seems that I have a good feeling about playing Rise of Merlin, but I don't know. We'll see how lucky I will be later.Pragmatic Play takes much longer to get you the bonus feature and the only way to get it sometimes is to buy the bonus which in most of the cases pay very little money back like 5-15% and rare are the cases when you win big from a buy bonus.Many people play Pragmatic and I also thought them to be better than Play n Go but I changed my mind and the reason is,if you play 40 dollars with a minimum amount bet like 0.10 it is a sure thing that you will get at least once the bonus round in Play n Go games,normally you will get it more than one time but as a bare minimum you will get it while by playing Pragmatic slot you can play much more than 40 dollars with minimum bet and still don't get the bonus game,meaning their volatility is much higher than Play n Go and as such Play n Go is better in this context.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on February 06, 2023, 07:53:25 PMPragmatic Play takes much longer to get you the bonus feature and the only way to get it sometimes is to buy the bonus which in most of the cases pay very little money back like 5-15% and rare are the cases when you win big from a buy bonus.I believed the chance of hitting the bonus feature is not because of the game provider but because it's just really tough to hit for others while it's easy on some. Luck-based indeed. There are lucky gamblers who can get it on a few spins while on the other hand, there are unfortunate and the worst, the bankroll will be depleted first and not get a chance to hit that feature.Quote from: swogerino on February 06, 2023, 07:53:25 PMMany people play Pragmatic and I also thought them to be better than Play n Go but I changed my mind and the reason is,if you play 40 dollars with a minimum amount bet like 0.10 it is a sure thing that you will get at least once the bonus round in Play n Go games,normally you will get it more than one time but as a bare minimum you will get it while by playing Pragmatic slot you can play much more than 40 dollars with minimum bet and still don't get the bonus game,meaning their volatility is much higher than Play n Go and as such Play n Go is better in this context.I understand why you end up on that observation but still, we can't really compare who's got the better chance rate to hit that bonus feature between Pragmatic Play and Play and Go. Anyways, since Pragmatic Play is not available in our region, I never experienced playing at their games so maybe I miss the fact that your observation might be true. My response is based generally on the chance of hitting the bonus feature on all game providers.(Apology to OP for not giving a direct response related to this topic. I was just about to open my Stake account and try to check my game history there involving playing in Play and Go. Not sure if I experienced winning a decent here since I'm playing at various game providers.)

comments.author: jostorres
comments.body: Quote from: maydna on February 06, 2023, 02:51:20 PMI'm not a fan of Play'n Go, but I've played a few games from that provider. But to be honest, I haven't found a game from the Play'n Go provider, which is my favorite because I prefer games from the Pragmatic Play provider as my favorite.Perhaps later, I will try to see the games from this Play'n Go provider, and it seems that I have a good feeling about playing Rise of Merlin, but I don't know. We'll see how lucky I will be later.Sometimes it takes time or a lot of gameplay before we can develop a liking from another game. Maybe you need to play more Play'n Go games and playing more of it can also increase your chances of winning big prizes. That should be the time to get you addicted on them. But between Play'n Go and pragmatic, I also think that pragmatic is more popular.Maybe this provider is just good at making good games and the difficulty of the games that they are offering (in terms of winning) aren't also hard as the other gaming providers out there. You had a good feeling of the rise of merlin. That is because it has a good feedback and some users already said they win big on it. Good luck for trying it and who knows, you might be the next on the list to win big.
